description:
Futayo Honda is a student of Mikawa, and is Masazumi Honda`s second cousin. She is Tadakatsu Honda`s daughter, one of the Four Divine Matsudaira Kings, and is the head of the Mikawa Security Force. Because she has only ever received combat training from Tadakatsu, she is incredibly clueless about the world.
She starts a battle with Musashi students against the idea to save Horizon, but was defeated by Aoi Kimi. Kimi convinces her that she has to serve Horizon since she is the princess of her land, so then she joins the Musahi Team.
name: Honda Futayo
